parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language of the values for specific response parameters. Default value: en. Valid values: en, zh, and ja.

parameters.name: MonitorConfigId
parameters.description: The ID of the health check task.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the health check feature. Valid values:

*   OPEN: enables the health check feature.
*   CLOSE: disables the health check feature.
